subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Mexico’s national team will play exhibition games against China, Argentina and Peru in the United States as it prepares for the start of World Cup qualifying. El Tri will meet China at Seattle on April 16, Argentina at San Diego on June 4 and Peru at Chicago on June 8, Soccer United Marketing said.
